welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santo Agostinho, Brazil! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's vibrant culture, beautiful beaches, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Santo Agostinho has to offer.

restaurants.name: Santo Gosto
restaurants.description: Santo Gosto is a restaurant located in Cabo de Santo Agostinho.

restaurants.name: Locker Lanches
restaurants.description: Locker Lanches is a diner located in Cabo.

restaurants.name: Pizzaria Massa Kent
restaurants.description: Pizzaria Massa Kent is a pizzeria located in Cabo de Santo Agostinho.
restaurants.address: Rua Quartoze, 105 - Cohab, Cabo de Santo Agostinho, PE

restaurants.name: Caldinho's frutos do mar
restaurants.description: Caldinho's frutos do mar is a fish and chips shop located in Cabo.

restaurants.name: Hamburgueria 55
restaurants.description: Hamburgueria 55 is a burger joint located in Cabo.
restaurants.address: Av . Eraldo Barros De Souza, Cabo, PE

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guararapes International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights only.

wifi.note: The WiFi is free and unlimited, but may have intermittent service in certain areas of the airport.
